org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders

Class TranscoderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders.TranscoderBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataTranscoder, ScalableTranscoder, SkinTranscoder, SoundTranscoder, XMLTranscoder

    public abstract class TranscoderBase
extends Object
    Base class for all embed transcoders

    • Method Detail

      • doTranscode

        protected abstract Map<String,ICharacterTag> doTranscode(Collection<ITag> tags,
                                    Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Transcode the embedded asset
        Parameters:
        tags - The collection of transcoded asset tags
        problems - The collection of compiler problems to which this method will add problems.
        Returns:
        map of symbol name to character asset tags. null if error

      • getTags

        public Map<String,ICharacterTag> getTags(Collection<ITag> tags,
                                Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        The relevant SWF tags
        Parameters:
        tags - The transcoded asset tags
        problems - The collection of compiler problems to which this method will add problems.
        Returns:
        map of symbol name to character asset tags. null if error. the returned map may not be modified.
